title: Re-add Reply and React button labels

requirements.summary: Add visible 'Reply' text label to the reply button in the MessageBubble component
acceptanceCriteria: The reply button displays 'Reply' text label alongside the reply icon
The label is visible and readable in the message bubble UI

file_operations.description: Add 'Reply' text label to the reply button element. Locate the reply button JSX (which currently renders a reply icon) and add a text span element containing 'Reply' adjacent to the icon. Ensure the label is styled to be visible and maintains the existing button functionality and layout. The icon should remain in place with the text label appearing next to it.

requirements.summary: Add visible 'React' text label to the react button in the MessageBubble component
acceptanceCriteria: The react button displays 'React' text label alongside the reaction icon
The label is visible and readable in the message bubble UI

file_operations.description: Add 'React' text label to the react button element. Locate the react/emoji button JSX (which currently renders a reaction icon) and add a text span element containing 'React' adjacent to the icon. Ensure the label is styled to be visible and maintains the existing button functionality and layout. The icon should remain in place with the text label appearing next to it.
